title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file.

OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message pops up.

EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.

SR: 
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects that contain files with the same name under different directories.
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g., test.zip).
4. Begin the export process to the zip file.
